== Description ==

Whether a sub-domain configuration is enabled. This function was added in version 3.0.0.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php is_subdomain_install(); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

None

== Return Values ==

; (Boolean) : True if sub-domain configuration is enabled, false otherwise.
